title: font ID: 'into the tunnel' type
content:
book cover for Gotz Aly's 'Into the Tunnel' (Metropolitan, 2008) designed by Lisa Fyfe

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019174129im_/http:/typophile.com/files/into%20the%20tunnel%20type_3459.jpg)
author: akiley

comments.content:
Tough to say with that sample, but I'd say it's probably [Canby](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019174129/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/canby/) by Jeff Levine.

Also look at [Refrigerator](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019174129/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/refrigerator/), [Diamante](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019174129/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/diamante/ef-demi-bold/), [Solano Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019174129/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/mvbfonts/solano-gothic-mvb/) and [Stratum 2](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019174129/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/processtype/stratum2/)

Thanks for the suggestions!

I guess I should have posted the whole cover - the 'A' and 'Y' in the author's name provide some more clues (and rule out the faces you suggested . . .)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019174129im_/http:/typophile.com/files/into_the_tunnel_large_6556.jpg)
